data.title: Holiday Cottages
data.meta_description: Dunvegan Castle has five charming period self-catering holiday cottages each with its own unique character and charm.
data.text:
Located within or close to the castle grounds, these charming cottages provide the perfect location for a get-away holiday in which to relax and enjoy the tranquillity of the castle’s formal gardens and the beauty of Loch Dunvegan. For the more adventurous, they are ideally situated as a base for fishing, hill walking and sightseeing on the Isle of Skye. Wi-Fi, bed linen and towels are included. Our holiday cottages operate a No Pets and No Smoking policy for the comfort of our guests.

Dunvegan Castle Holiday Cottages is open for online bookings all year excluding Christmas and New Year. For our FAQs, holiday cottages map, terms & conditions and cancellation policy, please click here.

A welcome pack awaits your arrival. It includes complimentary admission to Dunvegan Castle & Gardens when it is open to the public (1 April – 15 October) and also entitles our guests to an exclusive 15% discount at our shops, the MacLeod Tables Cafe, the Cuillin Coffee Cafe at Glenbrittle Campsite, and a discount on our seal boat trips.

We hope that you choose to stay with Dunvegan Castle Holiday Cottages on the Isle of Skye. We look forward to giving you a warm Highland Welcome.

SELECT A COTTAGE

Dunvegan Castle Holiday Cottages

Dunvegan House

Dunvegan

Isle of Skye IV55 8WF

T: +44 (0) 1470 521206 (ext.4)

E: [email protected]
